snippet: What debate was part of the determination that 1 World Trade Center is now the country’s tallest building?
abstract: What debate was part of the determination that 1 World Trade Center is now the country’s tallest building?
lead_paragraph: In “By a Spire, Manhattan Regains a Title From Chicago,” Patrick McGeehan and Charles V. Bagli write about the new tallest building in the United States.

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | 1 World Trade Center Is Named the Tallest Building in the U.S.
